class.name: AttachNotSupportedException
class.javadoc: Thrown by {@link com.sun.tools.attach.VirtualMachine#attachVirtalMachine} when attempting to attach to a Java virtual machine for which a compatible {@link com.sun.tools.attach.spi.AttachProviderAttachProvider} does not exist. It is also thrown by {@link com.sun.tools.attach.spi.AttachProvider#attachVirtualMachineAttachProvider} if the provider attempts to attach to a Java virtual machine with which it not comptatible.
Constructs an AttachNotSupportedException with no detail message.
Constructs an AttachNotSupportedException with the specified detail message. s the detail message.
